explains: n. 论说文作家，杂文作家，散文家

sentences.en: A critical consensus has appeared that Mary McCarthy will be remembered principally as an essayist rather than as a novelist.
sentences.cn: 一个批判性的共识已经出现，即玛丽·麦卡锡将作为散文家而不是小说家被人们记住。

sentences.en: Thomas Carlyle, British essayist and historian.
He is a novelist, poet, children's writer, critic, editor and essayist.
sentences.cn: 他是一个小说家，诗人，儿童作家，评论家，编辑和论文集作者。
